verses.arabic: وَٱلطُّورِ
verses.translation: By the Mount (of Revelation);

verses.arabic: وَكِتَـٰبٍ مَّسْطُورٍ
verses.translation: By a Decree inscribed

verses.arabic: فِى رَقٍّ مَّنشُورٍ
verses.translation: In a Scroll unfolded;

verses.arabic: وَٱلْبَيْتِ ٱلْمَعْمُورِ
verses.translation: By the much-frequented Fane;

verses.arabic: وَٱلسَّقْفِ ٱلْمَرْفُوعِ
verses.translation: By the Canopy Raised High;

verses.arabic: وَٱلْبَحْرِ ٱلْمَسْجُورِ
verses.translation: And by the Ocean filled with Swell;-

verses.arabic: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَٰقِعٌ
verses.translation: Verily, the Doom of thy Lord will indeed come to pass;-

verses.arabic: مَّا لَهُۥ مِن دَافِعٍ
verses.translation: There is none can avert it;-

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ تَمُورُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ مَوْرًا
verses.translation: On the Day when the firmament will be in dreadful commotion.

verses.arabic: وَتَسِيرُ ٱلْجِبَالُ سَيْرًا
verses.translation: And the mountains will fly hither and thither.

verses.arabic: فَوَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Then woe that Day to those that treat (Truth) as Falsehood;-

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى خَوْضٍ يَلْعَبُونَ
verses.translation: That play (and paddle) in shallow trifles.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
verses.translation: That Day shall they be thrust down to the Fire of Hell, irresistibly.

verses.arabic: هَـٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: "This:, it will be said, "Is the Fire,- which ye were wont to deny!

verses.arabic: أَفَسِحْرٌ هَـٰذَآ أَمْ أَنتُمْ لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: "Is this then a fake, or is it ye that do not see?

verses.arabic: ٱصْلَوْهَا فَٱصْبِرُوٓا۟ أَوْ لَا تَصْبِرُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: "Burn ye therein: the same is it to you whether ye bear it with patience, or not: Ye but receive the recompense of your (own) deeds."
verses.transliteration: Islawha fasbirooaw la tasbiroo sawaon AAalaykum innamatujzawna ma kuntum taAAmaloon

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَنَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: As to the Righteous, they will be in Gardens, and in Happiness,-

verses.arabic: فَـٰكِهِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ وَوَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Enjoying the (Bliss) which their Lord hath bestowed on them, and their Lord shall deliver them from the Penalty of the Fire.
verses.transliteration: Fakiheena bima atahumrabbuhum wawaqahum rabbuhum AAathaba aljaheem

verses.arabic: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: (To them will be said:) "Eat and drink ye, with profit and health, because of your (good) deeds."

verses.arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مَّصْفُوفَةٍ ۖ وَزَوَّجْنَـٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ
verses.translation: They will recline (with ease) on Thrones (of dignity) arranged in ranks; and We shall join them to Companions, with beautiful big and lustrous eyes.
verses.transliteration: Muttaki-eena AAala sururin masfoofatinwazawwajnahum bihoorin AAeen

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعَتْهُمْ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَـٰنٍ أَلْحَقْنَا بِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَمَآ أَلَتْنَـٰهُم مِّنْ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَىْءٍ ۚ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٌ
verses.translation: And those who believe and whose families follow them in Faith,- to them shall We join their families: Nor shall We deprive them (of the fruit) of aught of their works: (Yet) is each individual in pledge for his deeds.
verses.transliteration: Wallatheena amanoo wattabaAAat-humthurriyyatuhum bi-eemanin alhaqnabihim thurriyyatahum wama alatnahum minAAamalihim min shay-in kullu imri-in bima kasaba raheen

verses.arabic: وَأَمْدَدْنَـٰهُم بِفَـٰكِهَةٍ وَلَحْمٍ مِّمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.translation: And We shall bestow on them, of fruit and meat, anything they shall desire.

verses.arabic: يَتَنَـٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا لَّا لَغْوٌ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأْثِيمٌ
verses.translation: They shall there exchange, one with another, a (loving) cup free of frivolity, free of all taint of ill.
verses.transliteration: YatanazaAAoona feeha ka/san lalaghwun feeha wala ta/theem

verses.arabic: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ غِلْمَانٌ لَّهُمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لُؤْلُؤٌ مَّكْنُونٌ
verses.translation: Round about them will serve, (devoted) to them, young male servants (handsome) as Pearls well-guarded.
verses.transliteration: Wayatoofu AAalayhim ghilmanunlahum kaannahum lu/luon maknoon

verses.arabic: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.translation: They will advance to each other, engaging in mutual enquiry.

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبْلُ فِىٓ أَهْلِنَا مُشْفِقِينَ
verses.translation: They will say: "Aforetime, we were not without fear for the sake of our people.
verses.transliteration: Qaloo inna kunna qablufee ahlina mushfiqeen

verses.arabic: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ
verses.translation: "But Allah has been good to us, and has delivered us from the Penalty of the Scorching Wind.

verses.arabic: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبْلُ نَدْعُوهُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: "Truly, we did call unto Him from of old: truly it is He, the Beneficent, the Merciful!"
verses.transliteration: Inna kunna min qablu nadAAoohuinnahu huwa albarru arraheem

verses.arabic: فَذَكِّرْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعْمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٍ وَلَا مَجْنُونٍ
verses.translation: Therefore proclaim thou the praises (of thy Lord): for by the Grace of thy Lord, thou art no (vulgar) soothsayer, nor art thou one possessed.
verses.transliteration: Fathakkir fama anta biniAAmatirabbika bikahin wala majnoon

verses.arabic: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٌ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيْبَ ٱلْمَنُونِ
verses.translation: Or do they say:- "A Poet! we await for him some calamity (hatched) by Time!"
verses.transliteration: Am yaqooloona shaAAirun natarabbasubihi rayba almanoon

verses.arabic: قُلْ تَرَبَّصُوا۟ فَإِنِّى مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْمُتَرَبِّصِينَ
verses.translation: Say thou: "Await ye!- I too will wait along with you!"

verses.arabic: أَمْ تَأْمُرُهُمْ أَحْلَـٰمُهُم بِهَـٰذَآ ۚ أَمْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
verses.translation: Is it that their faculties of understanding urge them to this, or are they but a people transgressing beyond bounds?
verses.transliteration: Am ta/muruhum ahlamuhum bihathaam hum qawmun taghoon

verses.arabic: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Or do they say, "He fabricated the (Message)"? Nay, they have no faith!

verses.arabic: فَلْيَأْتُوا۟ بِحَدِيثٍ مِّثْلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُوا۟ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.translation: Let them then produce a recital like unto it,- If (it be) they speak the truth!

verses.arabic: أَمْ خُلِقُوا۟ مِنْ غَيْرِ شَىْءٍ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰلِقُونَ
verses.translation: Were they created of nothing, or were they themselves the creators?
verses.transliteration: Am khuliqoo min ghayri shay-in am humu alkhaliqoon

verses.arabic: أَمْ خَلَقُوا۟ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ ۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ
verses.translation: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? Nay, they have no firm belief.
verses.transliteration: Am khalaqoo assamawatiwal-arda bal la yooqinoon

verses.arabic: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْمُصَۣيْطِرُونَ
verses.translation: Or are the Treasures of thy Lord with them, or are they the managers (of affairs)?
verses.transliteration: Am AAindahum khaza-inu rabbika amhumu almusaytiroon

verses.arabic: أَمْ لَهُمْ سُلَّمٌ يَسْتَمِعُونَ فِيهِ ۖ فَلْيَأْتِ مُسْتَمِعُهُم بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: Or have they a ladder, by which they can (climb up to heaven and) listen (to its secrets)? Then let (such a) listener of theirs produce a manifest proof.
verses.transliteration: Am lahum sullamun yastamiAAoona feehifalya/ti mustamiAAuhum bisultanin mubeen

verses.arabic: أَمْ لَهُ ٱلْبَنَـٰتُ وَلَكُمُ ٱلْبَنُونَ
verses.translation: Or has He only daughters and ye have sons?

verses.arabic: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍ مُّثْقَلُونَ
verses.translation: Or is it that thou dost ask for a reward, so that they are burdened with a load of debt?-
verses.transliteration: Am tas-aluhum ajran fahum min maghraminmuthqaloon

verses.arabic: أَمْ عِندَهُمُ ٱلْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ
verses.translation: Or that the Unseen in it their hands, and they write it down?

verses.arabic: أَمْ يُرِيدُونَ كَيْدًا ۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْمَكِيدُونَ
verses.translation: Or do they intend a plot (against thee)? But those who defy Allah are themselves involved in a Plot!
verses.transliteration: Am yureedoona kaydan fallatheenakafaroo humu almakeedoon

verses.arabic: أَمْ لَهُمْ إِلَـٰهٌ غَيْرُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.translation: Or have they a god other than Allah? Exalted is Allah far above the things they associate with Him!
verses.transliteration: Am lahum ilahun ghayru Allahisubhana Allahi AAamma yushrikoon

verses.arabic: وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ كِسْفًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطًا يَقُولُوا۟ سَحَابٌ مَّرْكُومٌ
verses.translation: Were they to see a piece of the sky falling (on them), they would (only) say: "Clouds gathered in heaps!"
verses.transliteration: Wa-in yaraw kisfan mina assama-isaqitan yaqooloo sahabun markoom

verses.arabic: فَذَرْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَـٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى فِيهِ يُصْعَقُونَ
verses.translation: So leave them alone until they encounter that Day of theirs, wherein they shall (perforce) swoon (with terror),-
verses.transliteration: Fatharhum hatta yulaqooyawmahumu allathee feehi yusAAaqoon

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُمْ كَيْدُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.translation: The Day when their plotting will avail them nothing and no help shall be given them.
verses.transliteration: Yawma la yughnee AAanhum kayduhumshay-an wala hum yunsaroon

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ عَذَابًا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: And verily, for those who do wrong, there is another punishment besides this: But most of them understand not.
verses.transliteration: Wa-inna lillatheena thalamooAAathaban doona thalika walakinna aktharahumla yaAAlamoon

verses.arabic: وَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا ۖ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
verses.translation: Now await in patience the command of thy Lord: for verily thou art in Our eyes: and celebrate the praises of thy Lord the while thou standest forth,
verses.transliteration: Wasbir lihukmi rabbikafa-innaka bi-aAAyunina wasabbih bihamdirabbika heena taqoom

verses.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَإِدْبَـٰرَ ٱلنُّجُومِ
verses.translation: And for part of the night also praise thou Him,- and at the retreat of the stars!
